ServiceAccount.UserName: [ServiceAccount Username - Can be a Domain Account]

ADServiceUser.UserName: [ADServiceUser Username - Active Directory Service user for enabling use of Integrated Windows Authentication with your portal.]

Installer.PatchesDir: [Path to Directory with Patches for Server]
PatchInstallOrder: Array of patch names to install in the needed order
Installer.EnableArcMapRuntime: [ Optional - True (Default) | False - Enables ArcMapRuntime. Available starting 10.9.1]
Installer.EnableDotnetSupport: [ Optional - True | False (Default)  - Enables .Net Extension Support. Available starting 10.9.1]

ConfigStoreCloudStorageAccount.CloudNamespace: [Required if using cloud storage - Unique identifiable string for your deployment to avoid conflicts.The namespace used for the S3 bucket/Azure Blob Storage Container must be unique for this ArcGIS Server site. ArcGIS appends the text arcgis-config-store- to the name you provide]

ServerDirectoriesCloudStorageAccount.CloudNamespace: [Required id using cloud storage - Unique identifiable string for your deployment to avoid conflicts]

Portal.PortalLicenseUserTypeId: [Portal License User Type Id- Required for 10.7 and above]

Installer.WebStylesPath: [Optional Parameter starting ArcGIS Enterprise 10.7.1 - Portal Web Styles Installer Path]
Installer.ContentDir: [Portal Content Dir for Install- Ex. C:\arcgisportal
Installer.PatchesDir: [Path to Directory with Patches for Portal]
PatchInstallOrder: Array of patch names to install in the needed order

Portal.DefaultUserLicenseTypeIdForUser: [Optional (Valid for 10.7 and later) - Values: fieldWorkerUT | GISProfessionalStdUT | GISProfessionalBasicUT | GISProfessionalAdvUT | creatorUT | editorUT | viewerUT]

PortalContentCloudStorageAccount.CloudNamespace: [Required if using cloud storage - Unique identifiable string for your deployment to avoid conflicts. The namespace used for the Azure Blob Storage Container must be unique for this ArcGIS portal site. For Azure, Powershell DSC Module will prepend the text arcgis-portal-content- to the name you provide. For AWS, this variable corresponds to Bucket Name which should have been created before running this module]

Installer.PatchesDir: [Path to Directory with Patches for DataStore]
PatchInstallOrder: Array of patch names to install in the needed order

Relational.Name: [Required - Backup Name]
Relational.Location: [Required -  fs - fileshare location / s3 - Bucket Name / Azure - Container Name ]

CloudStorageAccount.UserName: [s3 - AWS Access Id / Azure - Cloud Storage Account Account Name/ ]
CloudStorageAccount.Password: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]
CloudStorageAccount.PasswordFile: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]

TileCache.Name: [Required - Backup Name]
TileCache.Location: [Required -  fs - fileshare location / s3 - Bucket Name / Azure -Container Name ]

CloudStorageAccount.UserName: [s3 - AWS Access Id / Azure - Cloud Storage Account Account Name/ ]
CloudStorageAccount.Password: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]
CloudStorageAccount.PasswordFile: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]

SpatioTemporal.Name: [Required - Backup Name]
SpatioTemporal.Location: [ fs - fileshare location / s3 - Bucket Name / Azure -Container Name ]

CloudStorageAccount.UserName: [s3 - AWS Access Id / Azure - Cloud Storage Account Account Name/ ]
CloudStorageAccount.Password: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]
CloudStorageAccount.PasswordFile: [s3 - AWS secret key / Azure - Cloud Storage Secret Key]

Installer.PatchesDir: [Path to Directory with Patches for Web Adaptor]
PatchInstallOrder: Array of patch names to install in the needed order
